Lancebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Live for Bounty.effect: If unit survives, get 1.5x shards/crystals from a Training Tower map. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Live for Honor.effect: If unit survives, get 1.5x badges from a Training Tower map. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Live to Serve 1.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, restores HP to unit = 50% of HP restored to target.

Lunge.effect: If unit initiates combat, unit and target foe swap spaces after combat.

Obstruct 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Obstruct 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

Pass 1.effect: If unit’s HP ≥ 75%, unit can move through foes’ spaces.

Pass 2.effect: If unit’s HP ≥ 50%, unit can move through foes’ spaces.

Pass 3.effect: If unit’s HP ≥ 25%, unit can move through foes’ spaces.

Poison Strike 1.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 4 damage to foe after combat.

Poison Strike 2.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foe after combat.

Poison Strike 3.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

Quick Riposte 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Quick Riposte 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 80% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

Quick Riposte 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% and foe initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

R Tomebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

Odd Res Wave 3.effect: At start of odd-numbered turns, grants Res+6 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

Odd Spd Wave 2.effect: At start of odd-numbered turns, grants Spd+4 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

Odd Spd Wave 3.effect: At start of odd-numbered turns, grants Spd+6 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

Ostia's Pulse.effect: At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown count-1 to all allies. Granted only if number of those allies' movement types on current team ≤ 2.

Panic Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-5 into penalties through their next actions.

Panic Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP ≤ unit's HP-3 into penalties through their next actions.

Panic Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP < unit's HP into penalties through their next actions.

R Tome Exp. 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a red tome, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

R Tome Exp. 2.effect: If unit survives combat, all red tome allies on team get 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

R Tome Exp. 3.effect: If unit survives combat, all red tome allies on team get 2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

R Tome Valor 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a red tome, unit gets 1.5x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

R Tome Valor 2.effect: If unit survives, all red tome allies on team get 1.5x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

R Tome Valor 3.effect: If unit survives, all red tome allies on team get 2x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Res Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Res-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Res Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Res Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Res-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Res Smoke 1.effect: Inflicts Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Res Smoke 2.effect: Inflicts Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Res Smoke 3.effect: Inflicts Res-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Res Tactic 1.effect: At start of turn, grants Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

Res Tactic 2.effect: At start of turn, grants Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

Res Tactic 3.effect: At start of turn, grants Res+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

Savage Blow 1.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 3 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Savage Blow 2.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 5 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Savage Blow 3.effect: If unit initiates combat, deals 7 damage to foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

Spd Ploy 1.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-3 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Spd Ploy 2.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Spd Ploy 3.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Spd Smoke 1.effect: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Spd Smoke 2.effect: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Spd Smoke 3.effect: Inflicts Spd-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

Spd Tactic 1.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+2 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

Spd Tactic 2.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+4 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

Spd Tactic 3.effect: At start of turn, grants Spd+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team ≤ 2.

Spur Atk 1.effect: Grants Atk+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Atk 2.effect: Grants Atk+3 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Atk 3.effect: Grants Atk+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Atk/Def 1.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk/Def+2 during combat.

Spur Atk/Def 2.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk/Def+3 during combat.

Spur Atk/Res 1.effect: Grants Atk/Res+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Atk/Spd 1.effect: Grants Atk/Spd+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Atk/Spd 2.effect: Grants Atk/Spd+3 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Def 1.effect: Grants Def+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Def 3.effect: Grants Def+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Def/Res 1.effect: Grants Def/Res+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Def/Res 2.effect: Grants Def/Res+3 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Res 1.effect: Grants Res+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Res 2.effect: Grants Res+3 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Res 3.effect: Grants Res+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Spd 1.effect: Grants Spd+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Spd 2.effect: Grants Spd+3 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Spd 3.effect: Grants Spd+4 to adjacent allies during combat.

Spur Spd/Res 1.effect: Grants Spd/Res+2 to adjacent allies during combat.

Staff Valor 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a Staff, unit gets 1.5x SP after combat or after using a healing Assist skill. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Staff Valor 2.effect: If unit survives, all Staff allies on team get 1.5x SP after combat or after using healing Assist skills. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Staff Valor 3.effect: If unit survives, all Staff allies on team get 2x SP after combat or after using healing Assist skills. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Sword Exp. 1.effect: If unit survives, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Sword Exp. 3.effect: If unit survives, all sword allies on team get 2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Sword Valor 1.effect: If unit survives and uses a sword, unit gets 1.5x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Sword Valor 3.effect: If unit survives, all sword allies on team get 2x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Threaten Atk 1.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

Threaten Atk 3.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

With Everyone!.effect: At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5 to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn.
